feed.title: Mitori Geiko
feed.subtitle: Enabling budoka to learn by watching recordings without distractions.

entry.title: 49th Jodo Taikai Godan Semi final 0-3
entry.summary:
Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi, Seigan
Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.
(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)
Sakan
Uchi: 1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu? 2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot...

entry.title: 49th Jodo Taikai Yondan Final 2-1
entry.summary:
Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi
Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.
(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)
Shamen
Uchi: 1) Are you correctly cutting Shomen to a line parallel to the floor? 2) After taking sufficient Maai are you correctly adopting Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?
Shi:...

entry.title: 49th Jodo Taikai Sandan Semi final 0-3
entry.summary:
Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi
Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.
(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)
Hissage
Uchi: 1) Is the Tachi's Kissaki equally aligned with the Jo in Awase? 2) From Hidari-jodan-no-kamae are you correctly cutting the Shomen? 3) Have you had Kuritsuk...
